1.0.2.en: Updated icons and texts to comply with guidlines. Also, minor bug fixes.

1.0.3.en: This version adds support for a wider range of installation setups, enhancing compatibility across different configurations. Please note that it includes some unnecessary trigger flow cards that will be removed in a future release (compressor and boiler related).

1.0.4.en: This version adds support for a wider range of installation setups, enhancing compatibility across different configurations.

1.0.5.en:
Added: New flow cards for heating mode control
Added: Improved error handling and stability
Added: Debug logging for troubleshooting
Fixed: Direct capability updates after flow card actions
Note: For best performance, please remove and re-add your devices after this update

1.0.6.en: Set Hot water temp 2. Sensor for return temperature.

1.0.8.en: Buffer temperature and return temperature sensors. Installations troubleshooting data automatically anonymized.

1.0.9.en: Add support for more data points from Vicare API and extended device features

1.0.10.en: Bug fix for trigger flow cards and improved error handling
